overview:
Adam Hofmann is the Director of Marketing and Community development for Zaarly.

At Zaarly, Adam leads the creation of hyper local launch strategies, digital marketing tactics and widespread community building. Prior to joining Zaarly, Adam was an integral part of the creation of Kauffman Labs (a subsidiary of the Ewing Marion Kauffman Foundation). While at Kauffman he was responsible for market analysis and selection as well as key networking efforts to ensure Kauffman Labs attracted the biggest names in industry to their incubator program. Adam began his career as a SAP technology consultant for Deloitte. As a consultant, he created and implemented key go-live plans and workflows. He was also responsible for managing a team of developers to ensure specific security and safety processes were compliant within new systems.

Adam attended The University of Kansas and graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Marketing with concentrations in Psychology and Entrepreneurship. On the side he is an award winning photographer, outdoor enthusiast, world traveler and golfer
